12ComponentState::ComponentState() {
13}
14
15void ComponentState::dirty() {
16 _dirty = true;
17}
18
19//===== COMPONENTS
20Component::Component(): Component([](Component*) {
21}) {
22}
23
24Component::Component(std::function<void(Component*)> inner)
25 : Component(new ComponentState(), inner) {
26 (*state.unwrap())->stateless_comp = true;
27}
28
29Component::Component(ComponentState* state)
30 : Component(state, [](Component*) {
31}) {
32}
33
34Component::Component(
35 ComponentState* state, std::function<void(Component*)> inner
36)
37 : state(state), dim(&state->dim) {
38 (*this->state.unwrap())->component_instance = this;
39 this->inner_redraw = std::move(inner);
40 parent.set_null();
41}
42
43//== Destructor
44Component::~Component() {
45 for (auto &child: children)
46 delete child;
47 children.clear();
48 //for (auto &child: param_children)
49 // delete child;
50 //param_children.clear();
51 if (state.let(_(ComponentState *, {
52 it->component_instance = nullptr;
53 return it->stateless_comp;
54 })) or false) {
55 state.set_null();
56 }
57}
58
59//== API for subclasses
60Component* Component::new_group() {
61 auto* c = new Component();
62 c->is_group = true;
63 return c;
64}
65
66void Component::add(
67 const std::vector<component_builder_t> &ichildren, bool prepend
68) const {
69 // TODO - Needs to be recursive when flattening groups, not just first layer
70 for (auto &item: ichildren) {
71 auto* child = item.build(item);
72 if (child == nullptr)
73 continue;
74 if (child->is_group) {
75 for (auto &subitem: child->children) {
76 if (subitem == nullptr || !subitem->state)
77 continue;
78 subitem->parent = (Component*) this;
79 (*subitem->state.unwrap())->win = (*state.unwrap())->win;
80 if (prepend) {
81 this->children.push_front(subitem);
82 } else {
83 this->children.push_back(subitem);
84 }
85 }
86 child->children.clear();
87 delete child;
88 } else {
89 child->parent = (Component*) this;
90 (*child->state.unwrap())->win = (*state.unwrap())->win;
91 if (prepend) {
92 this->children.push_front(child);
93 } else {
94 this->children.push_back(child);
95 }
96 }
97 }
98}
99
100void Component::redraw(cydui::layout::Layout* layout) {
101 inner_redraw(this);
102 on_redraw();
103
104 for (auto &child: children) {
105 child->redraw(layout);
106 }
107 state.let(_(ComponentState *, {
108 it->dragging_context = &layout->dragging_context;
109 it->_dirty = false;
110 }));
111}
112
113void Component::render(cydui::compositing::compositing_node_t* node) const {
114 node->id = (unsigned long) (*this->state.unwrap());
115 node->op = {
116 .x = dim->x.val(),
117 .y = dim->y.val(),
118 .w = dim->w.val(),
119 .h = dim->h.val(),
120 .rot = 0.0, // dim->rot.val(),
121 .scale_x = 1.0, // dim->scale_x.val(),
122 .scale_y = 1.0, // dim->scale_y.val(),
123 };
124
125 if (is_drawable()) {
126 on_render(node->graphics);
127 } else {
128 for (const auto &child: children) {
129 if (child) {
130 auto* c_node = new compositing::compositing_node_t();
131 node->children.push_back(c_node);
132 child->render(c_node);
133 }
134 }
135 }
136}
137
138bool cydui::components::Component::is_drawable() const {
139 return false;
140}
141
142#define COMP_EVENT_HANDLER_IMPL(EV, ARGS) void Component::on_##EV ARGS const
143#define RECURSIVE
144
145COMP_EVENT_HANDLER_IMPL(render, (vg::vg_fragment_t & graphics)) {
146}
147
148COMP_EVENT_HANDLER_IMPL(redraw, ()) {
149}
150
151COMP_EVENT_HANDLER_IMPL(key_press, (KeyData key)) { // NOLINT(misc-no-recursion)
152 parent.let(_(Component *, {
153 it->on_key_press(key);
154 }));
155}
156
157COMP_EVENT_HANDLER_IMPL(key_release, (KeyData key)) { // NOLINT(misc-no-recursion)
158 parent.let(_(Component *, {
159 it->on_key_release(key);
160 }));
161}
162
163COMP_EVENT_HANDLER_IMPL(mouse_enter, (int x, int y)) { // NOLINT(misc-no-recursion)
164 parent.let(_(Component *, {
165 auto &p = it;
166 p->on_mouse_enter(x + dim->x.val(), y + dim->y.val());
167 }));
168}
169
170COMP_EVENT_HANDLER_IMPL(mouse_click, (int x, int y, int button)) { // NOLINT(misc-no-recursion)
171 parent.let(_(Component *, {
172 auto &p = it;
173 p->on_mouse_click(x + dim->x.val(), y + dim->y.val(), button);
174 }));
175}
176
177COMP_EVENT_HANDLER_IMPL(mouse_exit, (int x, int y)) { // NOLINT(misc-no-recursion)
178 parent.let(_(Component *, {
179 auto &p = it;
180 p->on_mouse_exit(x + dim->x.val(), y + dim->y.val());
181 }));
182}
183
184COMP_EVENT_HANDLER_IMPL(mouse_motion, (int x, int y)) { // NOLINT(misc-no-recursion)
185 parent.let(_(Component *, {
186 auto &p = it;
187 p->on_mouse_motion(x + dim->x.val(), y + dim->y.val());
188 }));
189}
190
191COMP_EVENT_HANDLER_IMPL(drag_start, (int x, int y)) { // NOLINT(misc-no-recursion)
192 parent.let(_(Component *, {
193 auto &p = it;
194 p->on_drag_start(x + dim->x.val(), y + dim->y.val());
195 }));
196}
197
198COMP_EVENT_HANDLER_IMPL(drag_motion, (int x, int y)) { // NOLINT(misc-no-recursion)
199 parent.let(_(Component *, {
200 auto &p = it;
201 p->on_drag_motion(x + dim->x.val(), y + dim->y.val());
202 }));
203}
204
205COMP_EVENT_HANDLER_IMPL(drag_finish, (int x, int y)) { // NOLINT(misc-no-recursion)
206 parent.let(_(Component *, {
207 auto &p = it;
208 p->on_drag_finish(x + dim->x.val(), y + dim->y.val());
209 }));
210}
211
212COMP_EVENT_HANDLER_IMPL(scroll, (int dx, int dy)) { // NOLINT(misc-no-recursion)
213 parent.let(_(Component *, {
214 it->on_scroll(dx, dy);
215 }));
216}

218#undef COMP_EVENT_HANDLER_IMPL
